item.title: Ben Tossell
item.description: Twitter: @bentossell Webpage: https://bentossell.com AI newsletter Ben’s Bites : Daily mail with many links to news in the categories: tools, learn, research and everything else. Career Community lead at Product Hunt Founded Makerpad a no-code educational website, which was acquired by Zapier in March 2021
